Name: ECS MONITORING
checklistText:
<size=21>SYSTEMS & MONITORING CHECKS
EPS monitoring check</size>
SUIT COMP Î”P - .3-.4 psid
O2 SURGE TANK PRESS - 865-935 psia
REPRESS O2 >865 psia
PRIM RAD tb - gray
	*If PRIM RAD tb - 2			*
	*	ECS RAD FLOW AUTO CONT - 1 until*
	*		tb gray, then AUTO	*
ECS RAD TEMP PRIM IN - 67-97° F
ECS RAD TEMP PRIM OUT -  -20° - +63° F
PRIM GLY EVAP TEMP OUT - 38-50.5° F
PRIM GLY DISCH PRESS - 40-52 psig
SUIT TEMP - 45-55° F
SUIT PRESS/CABIN PRESS - 4.7-5.3 psia
PART PRESS CO2 < 7.5 mm Hg
POT H2O QTY - 10-100%
WASTE H2O QTY - 25-85%
